title: Unable to log into chat service
body: I have been attempting to log onto the chat services for ages and it just isn't letting me log in, and being unable to have chat services means I can't call in champ select which is really annoying so can anyone help?

replies.body:
Are you still getting this issue?

Have you tried [using an alternative DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq5)?
yea I have been disconnected from chat too. Rito pls D:
